name: Lazarus Activity
description: Detects different process creation events as described in Malwarebytes's threat report on Lazarus group activity
false_positives: Should not be any false positives
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*mshta* AND process.command_line:*.zip*) OR (process.parent.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\wmiprvse.exe AND process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\mshta.exe) OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Users\\Public\\* AND process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe))`
